title: The legendary challenge
body:
> - Your submission must be no longer than 1,500 words. There is no minimum requirement on word count however; if you can tell a compelling story in 6 words, you are truly mighty.

Challenge accepted.


----
I am Lee. I am Blind.

----

I await my reward

Word count: 6

replies.body:
who downvoted this -.-

(i upvoted i gotchu {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} )

LOL, I "see" what you mean. 
Did you get it, Lee is.... sorry I stole your joke I'll leave now....{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
